DOC.brief_summary: Pleth Variability Index (PVI) seems to be an ideal parameter to guide fluid management: dynamic parameter and non-invasive. PVI could guide fluid management during surgery and optimization of the plethysmographic-derived parameter could improve hemodynamics of the patients.
DOC.brief_title: Pleth Variability Index and Fluid Management During Surgery
DOC.criteria: Major abdominal surgery Refusal or inability to understand the protocol Arrythmia <18 years Contraindication to normal mechanical ventilation
